definitions.title: nipping,
definitions.body: concr. nipper usu. interpr. (since Hi) of a nipping or stinging insect (cf. Aram. [[קָרוֹחָא]], Ar. qa0ris.un biting insect); e.g. gadfly (cf. Thes:Add. 111), fig. of Nebuchadr. [[מִצָּפוֹן בָּא]] ´[[ק]]: Je 46:20 a gadfly cometh from the north; Vulgate (Aq Symm) stimulator, i.e. [[קׂרֵץ]]; Thes al., more gen., excidium.
